channel.title: [ENDED] Veteran Status (FREE game forever) ends in 2 hours @ 11:59pm EST!
channel.description:
Only 2 hours left to tell your friends to register @ https://www.ThroneOfLies.com to get the game FREE - FOREVER - by claiming "Veteran Status" for registering early.
**Register >> activate email >> that's it!**
Last calls :slight_smile:
**EDIT:** This promo ran from 1/1/2016 to 9/7/2016 and has now come to an end. Thank you, veterans! There are thousands of you!
As for those that missed the chance, be sure to register on our official site @ www.ThroneOfLies.com and confirm your email for newsletters that may contain future promos, contests, discounts and alpha/beta info!
